programme.desc: The No. 4 Blue Devils and No. 2 Cavaliers clash in the ACC Tournament championship game. Virginia needed overtime to dump Duke 69-62 on Feb. 11. Duke has won eight straight since that setback. Duke seeks an ACC-record 22nd title and first since 2019.
